# vertexBuffers

**Instance Property**

An array of motion keyframes, each containing triangle data.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexBuffers: [MTLMotionKeyframeData] { get set }
```

## Specifying vertex data

- **vertexStride**: The stride, in bytes, between vertices in each vertex buffer.

items.description: The stride, in bytes, between vertices in each vertex buffer.
